Congratulations you the real MVP 50 60 CreateTeamsActivity Team Player 1 Player 2 Choose corpus Reader: Listener: 0 SCORE: Team: Get ready !! Number of players: 4+

Alias is a word game that you play in turns.

In Alias you have to say a term in other words, using synonyms, opposites or clues so that your team mate guess as many words as possible.

 Before the beginning you can customize length of the turn and goal result .

You collect 1 point each time your team mate answers a term correctly and lose 1 point when you decide to give up and move on the next term.

Players must not use any part of the term, a derivate of it nor gestures(if you do so you are forced to press Wrong Button).

The team who reaches a goal result first is the winner. 1) Write your own corpus (recommended to do so on PC's notepad)

2) Every term has to go in new line

3) Do not make empty lines in the beginning, middle nor in the end of the file

4) Name your file "corpus.txt"

5) Open your sd card directory/corpus and place your file there

6) Press Proceed Button

Tip: Copy your course glossary to study with friends
